description: Provides a shell to display in a terminal component. A shell can be connected to a parent shell to build hierarchies of shells.

properties.name: shellname
properties.label: Shell Name
properties.description: Assign a name to this shell to identify the stream to assign it to a dashboard component. This name is also used as the shell command if registered at a parent shell.

properties.name: description
properties.label: Description
properties.description: Assign a short sentence to describe this shell.

properties.name: hasproperties
properties.label: Provides Get/Set/Delete/List Properties
properties.description: If enabled, this shell will provide to set, get, delete and list properties.

properties.name: parentflow
properties.label: Parent Flow Name
properties.description: Specify the flow name where the parent shell component is located.

properties.name: parentshell
properties.label: Parent Shell Name
properties.description: Specify the name of the parent shell where this shell should be registered as a sub shell.
